messages.subject: tsuba paper
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Jim, all - A short while back I tried to post this to the other groups unsuccessfully but I do believe the link is okay this time.  This refers to a Hozon
messages.messageBody:
Hi Jim, all -

A short while back I tried to post this to the other groups unsuccessfully but I do believe the link is okay this time. This refers to a Hozon paper which ended up with me a few years ago, for a tsuba that the guy I was dealing with sold a number of years back. I'd love to get this paper to the present tsuba owner. I've posted a picture of the tsuba--depicting "flying crane and man reading scroll"--on this groups' photo page. It is labeled "tsuba paper."

http://photos.groups.yahoo.com/group/nihontostudy/lst

If anyone owns this tsuba please let me know and I'll send its paper to you.

Ron
STL


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
